name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sensus - AI Sensor for your GitHub comments

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your unobtrusive AI helper for more humane, constructive GitHub comments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nothing discourages people from collaborating with you more than impolite and dismissive comments.

Usually, you donâ€™t want to be a jerk, but sometimes you are. Sorry.

This extension is a helper that watches your GitHub comments and lets you know when you are acting destructively.
